benchmark_details.name: FinGen: A Dataset for Argument Generation in Finance
benchmark_details.overview: FinGen introduces three tasks centered on forward-looking argument generation in finance: Evidence2Claim, Chart2Argument, and News2Argument.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To facilitate the generation of forward-looking arguments in the financial sector.
purpose_and_intended_users.limitations: The dataset sizes for Chart2Argument and News2Argument are small and do not cover multilingual data from the same source.

data.source: Collected earnings conference calls, trading blogs, and professional analyst reports.
data.annotation: Manually annotated with forward-looking claims and arguments.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated comparing model outputs to human-generated references.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better alignment with human-like forward-looking claims.
methodology.validation: Used a training-evaluation split of 80-20 for instance selection.

targeted_risks.demographic_analysis: The dataset includes both English and Chinese texts.
